title: Expert Course on Activity-Based Learning Design for Strengthening Learner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Need for Strengthening Effective Learning Design Competencies in Language Education Programs for Corporate Managers/Leaders

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning modules applying student-centered design principles with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can develop a feedback routine to improve learning activities at least twice by analyzing formative assessment data.
Learners can collaboratively generate at least three cooperative learning scenarios tailored to learner needs with peers.

resources: LMS platform (discussion board, assignment submission feature)
Online brainstorming tool for collaborative learning

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
